short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Zombie Tsunami is a fast-paced endless runner game where you control a growing horde of zombies.
short.bg: Zombie Tsunami е бърза безкрайна игра, в която контролирате нарастваща орда от зомбита.
short.ca: Zombie Tsunami és un joc de corredors sense fi de ritme ràpid on controles una horda creixent de zombis.
short.cs: Zombie Tsunami je rychlá nekonečná běžecká hra, kde ovládáte rostoucí hordu zombie.
short.da: Zombie Tsunami er et hurtigt endeløst løberspil, hvor du styrer en voksende horde af zombier.
short.de: Zombie Tsunami ist ein rasantes Endlos-Runner-Spiel, in dem Sie eine wachsende Horde Zombies kontrollieren.
short.el: Το Zombie Tsunami είναι ένα γρήγορο παιχνίδι ατελείωτου δρομέα όπου ελέγχετε μια αυξανόμενη ορδή ζόμπι.
short.es: Zombie Tsunami es un trepidante juego de carreras sin fin en el que controlas una creciente horda de zombis.
short.et: Zombie Tsunami on kiire tempoga lõputu jooksjamäng, kus juhite kasvavat zombide hordi.
short.fi: Zombie Tsunami on nopeatempoinen loputon juoksijapeli, jossa ohjaat kasvavaa zombilaumaa.
short.fil: Ang Zombie Tsunami ay isang mabilis na walang katapusang laro ng runner kung saan kinokontrol mo ang dumaraming kawan ng mga zombie.
short.fr: Zombie Tsunami est un jeu de course sans fin et rapide dans lequel vous contrôlez une horde croissante de zombies.
short.he: זומבי צונאמי הוא משחק רצים אינסופי מהיר שבו אתה שולט בהמון הולך וגדל של זומבים.
short.hi: ज़ोंबी सुनामी एक तेज़ गति वाला अंतहीन धावक गेम है जहां आप ज़ोंबी की बढ़ती भीड़ को नियंत्रित करते हैं।
short.hr: Zombie Tsunami je brza beskonačna trkačka igra u kojoj kontrolirate rastuću hordu zombija.
short.hu: A Zombie Tsunami egy gyors tempójú, végtelen futójáték, amelyben zombik növekvő hordáját irányíthatod.
short.id: Zombie Tsunami adalah game pelari tak berujung yang bergerak cepat di mana Anda mengontrol segerombolan zombie yang terus bertambah.
short.it: Zombie Tsunami è un gioco di corsa infinita dal ritmo frenetico in cui controlli un'orda crescente di zombi.
short.ja: Zombie Tsunami は、増え続けるゾンビの大群を操作する、ペースの速いエンドレス ランナー ゲームです。
short.ko: Zombie Tsunami는 점점 늘어나는 좀비 무리를 제어하는 ​​빠르게 진행되는 끝없는 러너 게임입니다.
short.lt: Zombie Cunami yra greitas begalinis bėgikų žaidimas, kuriame valdote augančią zombių minią.
short.lv: Zombie Cunami ir ātra un bezgalīga skrējēju spēle, kurā jūs kontrolējat augošu zombiju baru.
short.ms: Zombie Tsunami ialah permainan pelari tanpa henti yang pantas di mana anda mengawal gerombolan zombi yang semakin meningkat.
short.nl: Zombie Tsunami is een snel, eindeloos runnerspel waarin je een groeiende horde zombies bestuurt.
short.no: Zombie Tsunami er et fartsfylt endeløst løperspill hvor du kontrollerer en voksende horde av zombier.
short.pl: Zombie Tsunami to szybka gra typu „niekończący się biegacz”, w której kontrolujesz rosnącą hordę zombie.
short.ro: Zombie Tsunami este un joc de alergători fără sfârșit în ritm rapid în care controlezi o hoardă de zombi în creștere.
short.ru: Zombie Tsunami — это динамичный бесконечный раннер, в котором вы управляете растущей ордой зомби.
short.sk: Zombie Tsunami je rýchla nekonečná bežecká hra, v ktorej ovládate rastúcu hordu zombíkov.
short.sl: Zombie Tsunami je hitra neskončna tekaška igra, kjer nadzorujete naraščajočo hordo zombijev.
short.sr: Зомби цунами је брза бесконачна тркачка игра у којој контролишете растућу хорду зомбија.
short.sv: Zombie Tsunami är ett snabbt oändligt löparspel där du styr en växande hord av zombies.
short.th: Zombie Tsunami เป็นเกมวิ่งที่ดำเนินไปอย่างรวดเร็วไม่รู้จบซึ่งคุณจะได้ควบคุมฝูงซอมบี้ที่เพิ่มมากขึ้น
short.tr: Zombie Tsunami, büyüyen bir zombi sürüsünü kontrol ettiğiniz hızlı tempolu bir sonsuz koşucu oyunudur.
short.uk: Zombie Tsunami — це стрімкий нескінченний раннер, у якому ви керуєте зростаючою ордою зомбі.
short.vi: Zombie Tsunami là một trò chơi chạy vô tận có nhịp độ nhanh, nơi bạn điều khiển một đám zombie ngày càng tăng.
short.zh_CN: Zombie Tsunami 是一款快节奏的无尽跑酷游戏，您可以在其中控制不断壮大的僵尸大军。
short.zh_TW: Zombie Tsunami 是一款快節奏的無盡跑酷遊戲，您可以在其中控制不斷壯大的殭屍大軍。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take over the streets and build the biggest zombie horde ever with Zombie Tsunami! Control a wave of hungry zombies as you infect humans, dodge obstacles, and smash through everything in your way. Can you keep your horde growing while overcoming challenges?

🕹️ Key Features:
Grow Your Horde: Start with one zombie and infect pedestrians to grow your undead army.
Exciting Power-Ups: Transform into Ninja Zombies, Giant Zombies, and even UFOs for epic runs.
Travel the World: Run through iconic cities, complete missions, and earn rewards.
Compete & Share: Challenge friends, hit the leaderboards, and share your high scores.
Browser Ready: No downloads needed—just click and play anytime!
🧠 Tips for Success:
Plan your jumps to avoid bombs and deadly pits.
Upgrade your zombies to start stronger and boost performance.
Focus on pedestrians early to build your horde quickly.
Save your coins to unlock the best power-ups for longer runs.
Complete missions to unlock achievements and earn rewards.
🚀 Why Install Zombie Tsunami?

Endless Fun: Perfect for quick breaks or hours of gameplay.
Compete Anywhere: Play directly in your browser on school or work devices.
